metadata.user-data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: eurus-cloud
    groups: sudo
    shell: /bin/bash
    sudo: ["ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL"]
    ssh_authorized_keys:
      - ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAICBJOodclPNPYPA2pyGpmraEW7K7qzSFNOw7SFk9JxUq eurus@ubnt-vm

package_update: true
package_upgrade: false
packages: ["vim","nginx","mc"]

values.rendered:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: eurus-cloud
    groups: sudo
    shell: /bin/bash
    sudo: ["ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL"]
    ssh_authorized_keys:
      - ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAICBJOodclPNPYPA2pyGpmraEW7K7qzSFNOw7SFk9JxUq eurus@ubnt-vm

package_update: true

packages: ["vim","nginx","mc"]
values.template:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: ${username}
    groups: sudo
    shell: /bin/bash
    sudo: ["ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL"]
    ssh_authorized_keys:
      - ${ssh_public_key}
package_update: true
package_upgrade: false
packages: ${packages}

network_name.description: The name of the VPC network

subnet_name.description: The name of the VPC subnet

v4_cidr_blocks.description: IPv4 CIDR blocks for the subnet

zone.description: The availability zone where the subnet will be created

vm_username.description: Username for vm in Cloud init
